name: PARENTS ASSOCIATION OF MENTALLY HANDICAPPED OF JAMSHEDPUR
briefDescription: The Parents Association of Mentally Handicapped of Jamshedpur is a NGO established in 2004 by the parents of mentally disabled children of Jamshedpur and its adjoining areas. It is registered under Society Registration Act, Registered by the National Trust (An autonomous body under the Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment, G O I.) New Delhi, Registered under PwD Act- 1955, and affiliated to Parivar (A National level federation of parents in India)                                            It has been making concerted efforts for the empowerment and welfare of mentally disabled children with special focus on people suffering from autism, cerebral palsy, multiple disabilities and mental retardation with the continued co-operation and guidance from central and state government, local administration, and general public.PAMHJ is expanding its services to mentally challenged people and their families. PAMHJ is supported by the Urban Services of Tata Steel under its generous CSR programme.

address: Near Bank of Baroda Beside the Gazi Complex,Dhatkidih
